description: The Douglas B-26C Invader is a propeller-driven attack aircraft. The “Two Turrets” variant described here has a glazed nose, wing guns, and both dorsal and ventral turrets. Prior to 1948, it was designated A-26C.
variantdescription: with a glass nose, wing guns, and both dorsal and ventral turrets.
variantnotes: Bomb system is ballistic (-1) if doing level bombing from four or more altitude levels above the target.
